verses.name: 1 Samuel 22:3
verses.text: And David went thence to Mizpeh of Moab: and he said unto the king of Moab, Let my father and my mother, I pray thee, come forth, and be with you, till I know what God will do for me.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 22:4
verses.text: And he brought them before the king of Moab: and they dwelt with him all the while that David was in the hold.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 22:5
verses.text: And the prophet Gad said unto David, Abide not in the hold; depart, and get thee into the land of Judah. Then David departed, and came into the forest of Hareth.
